issue.title: [CF 722] Color Flash events not working
issue.body:
As of TMW Release 6.1.0, and continuing in Release 6.1.1, all "Color Flash" events do not work — nothing happens. This affects both newly-created icons, and icons that were working with Color Flash before 6.1.0.

Downgrading to Release 6.0.4 returns Color Flash event behavior to normal.

I would post an export string but this is not an icon-specific issue — setting up a Color Flash event on any icon, new or old, produces no result. Neither when tested with the Play button, nor when the Event criteria are met.


> Posted by CurseForge user Lov3star | Imported from CurseForge issue #722 | Raw
